N = int(input()) 
h = list(map(int,input().split())) 
 
cnt = 0 
for i in range(N): 
    if h[i] > cnt: 
        cnt = h[i] 
print(cnt) 

n = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    if h[i] > 0:
        ans += 1
        for j in range(i+1, n):
            if h[j] > 0:
                h[j] -= 1

print(ans)
n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))


a.sort()
a.reverse()

alice = 0
bob = 0
for i in range(n):
    if i % 2 == 0:
        alice += a[i]
    else:
        bob += a[i]

print(alice - bob)
import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

n = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    if h[i] > 0:
        ans += 1
        for j in range(i+1, n):
            if h[j] > 0:
                h[j] -= 1

print(ans)
